Hi guys... I have no plans to do a win7 with office sysprepped because of two things. One being that it is a lot harder to fool the genuine callback stuff in win7 because it does a callback in either the genuine activex update thing, and the kb971033.  It checks for blacklisted invalid KMS server epids.  Since every activator I'm aware of doesn't check for known blacklisted epids and randomize itself to a non-blacklisted version, I just don't feel confidently enough to release a special version for it.  I try not to add things that I know won't work very well.

That being said, yes I will release an AIO for win7 soon. I will do it up when I'm confident the torrents can sustain themselves. My first incorrectly named up still has a few stragglers downloading, but I might work on it tonight or tomorrow.

As far as sysprepped versions being viable options for the future, I think I'll just leave them to special case versions like win8+office.  There's just weird stuff that will come up when you use a sysprepped image on certain machines that never seems to come up when you use pre-integration methods like vlite or dism.

No worries guys, I won't give you any half-ass aio versions of 7 or 8 this month...
